nodes.text: Maghr Scutu was a male Aquala Aqualish smuggler who was present at Tansarii Point Station around 1 ABY.

Maghr Scutu appeared as a non-player character in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
